location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: File 3615/1913 Pt 3 'Persian Gulf Islands as to occupation in case of war with Persia'

mods.abstract: Part 3 of the volume (folios 3-16) contains a small amount of correspondence and notes about the merits of a Foreign Office proposal in 1915 to arrange an immediate British military occupation of Kishm, Larak, Henjam and other strategically positioned islands in the Persian Gulf, in order to protect British interests in the event of war between Great Britain and Persia. The main correspondents are officials at the Foreign Office and the India office in London.
